name: cacophonous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having an unpleasant mixture of sounds: We woke up to the cacophonous sound of birds. The restaurant is a cacophonous, high-ceilinged room. Synonyms
discordant
dissonant formal or specialized
grating
harsh (TOO STRONG)
shrill
strident (LOUD)
tunelessOpposites
euphonious formal
harmonious (MUSIC)
melodious formal
tunefulSee
cacophony
More examplesFewer examplesThe party was held at a cacophonous bowling alley.The mayor works at a desk in the middle of a huge cacophonous space. The play ends with a cacophonous and climactic mix of rage and tears and voices.A cacophonous roar came from the crowd.
